Index of /public/ftp/pub/Linux/system/emulators/dosemu

What you'll find here: various versions of the dos emulators

You can also view this index in terse format, or return to the parent directory.

Win3.1_Dosemu.HOWTO.gz (LSM entry) 13May95
info on getting dosemu to run MS Windows (4577 bytes)
dosemu-0.64.3.tgz (LSM entry) (LSM entry) 19Jan97
source for dosemu (1178497 bytes)
garrot02.tar.gz (LSM entry) (README) 12Dec94
returns doseme idle time to system (18240 bytes)
patch-0.60.4-dpmi.gz (README) 6Dec95
patch to enhance dosemu dpmi support (1000 bytes)
xdos0.4a.tgz 14Jun94
dos emulator designed for X (mouse works, etc) (277433 bytes)
